description: Provides a list of analysis segments for a real-time analysis session.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

nested_items.name: Segments
nested_items.description: An analyzed transcript or category.

nested_items.name: Transcript
nested_items.description: The analyzed transcript.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the transcript.

nested_items.name: ParticipantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the participant. Valid values are CUSTOMER or AGENT.

nested_items.name: ParticipantRole
nested_items.description: The role of participant. For example, is it a customer, agent, or system.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the transcript.

nested_items.name: BeginOffsetMillis
nested_items.description: The beginning offset in the contact for this transcript.

nested_items.name: EndOffsetMillis
nested_items.description: The end offset in the contact for this transcript.

nested_items.name: Sentiment
nested_items.description: The sentiment detected for this piece of transcript.

nested_items.name: IssuesDetected
nested_items.description: List of positions where issues were detected on the transcript.

nested_items.name: CharacterOffsets
nested_items.description: The offset for when the issue was detected in the segment.

nested_items.name: BeginOffsetChar
nested_items.description: The beginning of the issue.

nested_items.name: EndOffsetChar
nested_items.description: The end of the issue.

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: The matched category rules.

nested_items.name: MatchedCategories
nested_items.description: The category rules that have been matched in the analyzed segment.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MatchedDetails
nested_items.description: The category rule that was matched and when it occurred in the transcript.

nested_items.name: PointsOfInterest
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: PointsOfInterest
nested_items.description: The section of audio where the category rule was detected.

nested_items.name: BeginOffsetMillis
nested_items.description: The beginning offset in milliseconds where the category rule was detected.

nested_items.name: EndOffsetMillis
nested_items.description: The ending offset in milliseconds where the category rule was detected.

nested_items.name: PostContactSummary
nested_items.description: Information about the post-contact summary.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the summary.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Whether the summary was successfully COMPLETED or FAILED to be generated.

nested_items.name: FailureCode
nested_items.description: If the summary failed to be generated, one of the following failure codes occurs:
QUOTA_EXCEEDED: The number of concurrent analytics jobs reached your service quota.
INSUFFICIENT_CONVERSATION_CONTENT: The conversation needs to have at least one turn from both the participants in order to generate the summary.
FAILED_SAFETY_GUIDELINES: The generated summary cannot be provided because it failed to meet system safety guidelines.
INVALID_ANALYSIS_CONFIGURATION: This code occurs when, for example, you're using a language that isn't supported by generative AI-powered post-contact summaries.
INTERNAL_ERROR: Internal system error.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results. If response includes nextToken there are two possible scenarios:
There are more segments so another call is required to get them.
There are no more segments at this time, but more may be available later (real-time analysis is in progress) so the client should call the operation again to get new segments.
